snippet: GREENWALD--Doris Rae (Lewin), (May 25, 1926 - March 11, 2016), daughter of the late Dr. Murray Lewin and Kate Fines Lewin, sister of the late Shirley Zimmerman and Evylin Lustig, adored and adoring wife of the late Irwin Daniel Greenwald, beloved mother of Ronny Jo Siegal, extraordinarily proud grandmother of Samuel, Randi, Evan and Carolyn Siegal, beaming great-grandmother of Brett, Brooke, Riley and Isla. She lived her life as she passed with great strength and courage. Known for her beauty, quick wit, and style, she left an indelible mark on us all. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GREENWALD--Doris Rae (Lewin), (May 25, 1926 - March 11, 2016), daughter of the late Dr. Murray Lewin and Kate Fines Lewin, sister of the late Shirley Zimmerman and Evylin Lustig, adored and adoring wife of the late Irwin Daniel Greenwald, beloved mother of Ronny Jo Siegal, extraordinarily proud grandmother of Samuel, Randi, Evan and Carolyn Siegal, beaming great-grandmother of Brett, Brooke, Riley and Isla. She lived her life as she passed with great strength and courage. Known for her beauty, quick wit, and style, she left an indelible mark on us all. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GREENWALD, DORIS RAE (LEWIN)
